overview: "Supercharger" is supercharged with action! Supercharged with sex! The high-velocity, non-stop roaring pace of this high quality sex film takes you on a whirlwind rocket behind the scenes of the indy 500 and into the cockpits and bedrooms of the daredevil drivers and their hot-blooded, temptuous women ... it will supercharge your batteries at every eye-popping, breathtaking sexual twist. They drive their cards hard, but they drive their women even harder!
title: Supercharger
